artiano.core.structure

类 Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • artiano.core.structure.Matrix
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Description: Basic structure matrix, contains amount of operation on matrix.

    从以下版本开始:
    1.0.0
    版本:
    1.0.0
    作者:
    Nano.Michael, (latest modification by Nano.Michael)
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected Range colRange
      column range of the original matrix.
      protected int cols
      columns of the matrix
      protected double[] d
      data of the matrix
      protected int dCols
      data columns, the original columns of the matrix
      protected Range rowRange
      row range of the original matrix, while rowRange is specified, the start of the row index is rowRange.begin() relative to the original matrix, and the end index of the row index is rowRange.end().
      protected int rows
      rows of the matrix

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Matrix(int rows, int cols)
      Create a matrix with specified rows and columns.
      Matrix(int rows, int cols, double[] data)
      Create a matrix with specified rows and columns that holds data.

    • 字段详细资料

      • cols

        protected int cols
        columns of the matrix

      • rows

        protected int rows
        rows of the matrix

      • d

        protected double[] d
        data of the matrix

      • dCols

        protected int dCols
        data columns, the original columns of the matrix

      • rowRange

        protected Range rowRange
        row range of the original matrix, while rowRange is specified, the start of the row index is rowRange.begin() relative to the original matrix, and the end index of the row index is rowRange.end(). For example: while rowRange.start==2 and rowRange.end==5, the start and the end of the row index is 2 and 4 relatively.

      • colRange

        protected Range colRange
        column range of the original matrix.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Matrix

        public Matrix(int rows,
      int cols)
        Create a matrix with specified rows and columns.
        参数:
        rows - Rows of the matrix.
        cols - Columns of the matrix.

      • Matrix

        public Matrix(int rows,
      int cols,
      double[] data)
        Create a matrix with specified rows and columns that holds data.
      • NOTICE: If the size (size=rows*columns) of the matrix is less than the length of the data, the program can normally running, but that is not recommended.
参数:
rows - Rows of the matrix.
cols - Columns of the matrix.
data - Data to hold.

    • at

      public Matrix at(Range row,
        Range col)
      Get the sub-matrix determined by the row range and column range
    • NOTICE: The data will not be copied. If you want to get a copy of the sub-matrix, you should write code like:
      Matrix y=new Matrix(2,2); //create a new matrix with 2 rows and 2 columns
      x.at(new Range(1,3), new Range(2,4).copyTo(y); //copy the sub-matrix of x to y
参数:
row - Row range
col - Column range
返回:
A sub-matrix of the matrix

         boolean reserve)

    • 返回:
    Result

  • difference

    public double difference(Matrix x)
    Calculate the difference between current matrix and specified matrix x.
  • Given matrix x and y, the method to calculate the difference is:
    difference=sum[abs(x(i,j)-y(i,j)]
    • 参数:
    x - Input matrix x
    返回:
    Difference

  • l2Norm

    public double l2Norm(Matrix x)
    Calculate the l2-norm between current matrix and specified matrix x
  • Given matrix x and y, the method to calculate the l2-norm is:
    l2-norm=sqrt{sum[x(i, j) - y(i, j)]}
    • 参数:
    x -
    返回:
    - l2-norm

  • clone

    public Matrix clone()
    clone a matrix, data will copied
    覆盖:
    clone 在类中 java.lang.Object

  • print

    public void print()
    secondary function, print the matrix to console

  • mergeAfterRow

    public void mergeAfterRow(Matrix otherMx)
    Merge two matrices and store it to current matrix.
  • Given matrix x and y, and
    x=
    |1 2 3|
    |4 5 6|
    |7 8 9| ,
    y=
    |1 1 2|
    |2 2 1|
    The matrix after merge is:
    x=
    |1 2 3|
    |4 5 6|
    |7 8 9|
    |1 1 2|
    |2 2 1|
    参数:
    otherMx - Matrix to merge.
